snippet: One of the most feared big men in N.B.A. history, Shaquille O’Neal, left Dwight Howard out of the conversation about today’s top centers, which included the Nets’ Brook Lopez.
abstract: Shaquille O'Neal asserts that Brooklyn Nets center Brook Lopez and Philadelphia 76ers center Andrew Bynum are the league's best, surprisingly leaving Orlando Magic's Dwight Howard out of the conversation.
lead_paragraph: One of the most feared big men in N.B.A. history, Shaquille O’Neal, left Dwight Howard out of the conversation about today’s top centers, which included the Nets’ Brook Lopez.

headline.seo: Shaq’s Top 2 N.B.A. Centers: Lopez and Bynum
headline.main: O’Neal Names Top Two Centers, and a Net Is One of Them
headline.print_headline: O’Neal Names Top Two Centers, and a Net Is One of Them
